articles.title: Pfizer has sought emergency approval for COVID-19 vaccine in India - government adviser - Reuters
articles.description: Pfizer Inc has applied for emergency use authorisation of its coronavirus vaccine in India, a top government health adviser said in a TV interview on Sunday, the first to do so in a country with the world's second-highest number of infections.
articles.content:
